verses.verse: If one be found<WH4672> slain<WH2491> in the land<WH127> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you to possess<WH3423> it,<WH5307> lying in the field,<WH7704> and it isn't<WH3045> known who has struck him;<WH5221>
then your elders<WH2205> and your judges<WH8199> shall come forth,<WH3318> and they shall measure<WH4058> to the cities<WH5892> which are around<WH5439> him who is slain:<WH2491>

and it shall be,<WH5892> that the city which is nearest<WH7138> to the slain man,<WH2491> even the elders<WH2205> of that city<WH5892> shall take<WH3947> a heifer<WH1241> of the herd,<WH5647> which hasn't been worked with, and which has not drawn<WH4900> in the yoke;<WH5923>

and the elders<WH2205> of that city<WH5892> shall bring down<WH3381> the heifer<WH5697> to a<WH386> valley<WH5158> with running water,<WH5647> which is neither plowed nor sown,<WH2232> and shall break<WH6202> the heifer<WH5697>'s neck<WH6202> there in the valley.<WH5158>

The priests<WH3548> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> shall come near;<WH5066> for them Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has chosen<WH977> to minister<WH8334> to him,<WH1288> and to bless in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh;<WH3068> and according to their word<WH6310> shall every controversy<WH7379> and every stroke be.<WH5061>

All the elders<WH2205> of that city,<WH5892> who are nearest<WH7138> to the slain<WH2491> man,<WH7364> shall wash their hands<WH3027> over the heifer<WH5697> whose neck was broken<WH6202> in the valley;<WH5158>
and they shall answer<WH6030> and say,<WH559> "Our hands<WH3027> have not shed<WH8210> this blood,<WH1818> neither have our eyes<WH5869> seen it.<WH7200>

Forgive,<WH3722> Yahweh,<WH3068> your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> whom you have redeemed,<WH6299> and don't<WH5414> allow innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in the midst<WH7130> of your people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>" The blood<WH1818> shall be forgiven them.<WH3722>
So you shall put away<WH1197> the innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> from the midst<WH7130> of you,<WH6213> when you shall do that which is right<WH3477> in the eyes<WH5869> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

When you go forth<WH3318> to battle<WH4421> against your enemies,<WH341> and Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> delivers<WH5414> them into your hands,<WH3027> and you carry<WH7617> them away captive,<WH7628>
and see<WH7200> among the captives<WH7633> a beautiful<WH8389> woman,<WH802> and you have a desire<WH2836> to her,<WH3947> and would take her to you as wife;<WH802>
then you shall bring<WH935> her home<WH8432> to your house;<WH1004> and she shall shave<WH1548> her head,<WH7218> and pare<WH6213> her nails;<WH6856>

and she shall put<WH5493> the clothing<WH8071> of her captivity<WH7628> from off her,<WH3427> and shall remain in your house,<WH1004> and bewail<WH1058> her father<WH1> and her mother<WH517> a full<WH3117> month:<WH3391> and after<WH310> that you shall go<WH935> in to her,<WH1166> and be her husband, and she shall be your wife.<WH802>

It shall be,<WH2654> if you have no delight in her,<WH7971> then you shall let her go where she will;<WH5315> but you shall not sell<WH4376> her at all<WH4376> for money,<WH3701> you shall not deal<WH6014> with her as a slave,<WH834> because you have humbled her.<WH6031>

If a man<WH376> have two<WH8147> wives,<WH802> the one<WH259> beloved,<WH157> and the other<WH259> hated,<WH8130> and they have borne<WH3205> him children,<WH1121> both the beloved<WH157> and the hated;<WH8130> and if the firstborn<WH1060> son<WH1121> be hers who was hated;<WH8146>

then it shall be,<WH3117> in the day that he causes his sons<WH1121> to inherit<WH5157> that which he has,<WH3201> that he may not make the son<WH1121> of the beloved<WH157> the firstborn<WH1069> before<WH6440> the son<WH1121> of the hated,<WH8130> who is the firstborn:<WH1060>

but he shall acknowledge<WH5234> the firstborn,<WH1060> the son<WH1121> of the hated,<WH8130> by giving<WH5414> him a double<WH8147> portion<WH6310> of all that he has;<WH4672> for he is the beginning<WH7225> of his strength;<WH202> the right<WH4941> of the firstborn is his.<WH1062>

If a man<WH376> have a stubborn<WH5637> and rebellious<WH4784> son,<WH1121> who will not obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of his father,<WH1> or the voice<WH6963> of his mother,<WH517> and,<WH3256> though they chasten him,<WH8085> will not listen to them;
then shall his father<WH1> and his mother<WH517> lay hold<WH8610> on him,<WH3318> and bring him out to the elders<WH2205> of his city,<WH5892> and to the gate<WH8179> of his place;<WH4725>

and they shall tell<WH559> the elders<WH2205> of his city,<WH5892> "This our son<WH1121> is stubborn<WH5637> and rebellious,<WH4784> he will not obey<WH8085> our voice;<WH6963> he is a glutton,<WH2151> and a drunkard.<WH5433>"

All the men<WH582> of his city<WH5892> shall stone<WH7275> him to death<WH4191> with stones:<WH7275> so you shall put<WH1197> away<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> from the midst<WH7130> of you;<WH3478> and all Israel shall hear,<WH8085> and fear.<WH3372>
If a man<WH376> have committed a sin<WH2399> worthy of<WH4941> death,<WH4194> and he be put to death,<WH4194> and you hang<WH8518> him on a tree;<WH6086>

his body<WH5038> shall not remain all night<WH3885> on the tree,<WH6086> but you shall surely<WH6912> bury<WH6912> him the same day;<WH3117> for he who is hanged<WH8518> is accursed<WH7045> of God;<WH430> that you don't<WH2930> defile your land<WH127> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you for an inheritance.<WH5159>
